meanings.definition: The end of the week, typically Saturday and Sunday.
meanings.sent1: Last weekend, we went hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the weekend for some relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The weekend flew by so quickly, it felt like a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: The weekend was a refreshing oasis in the midst of a busy workweek.
meanings.sent5: The weekend's arrival brought a sense of relief and joy to everyone.

meanings.definition: A period of time that includes the end of the week and the beginning of the next week.
meanings.sent1: During the weekend, we planned our upcoming projects.
meanings.sent2: The weekend is a great time to catch up on household chores.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally slept through the entire weekend, missing all the fun.
meanings.sent4: The weekend bridges the gap between the old and new week like a smooth transition.
meanings.sent5: The weekend's essence lies in its ability to reset and recharge for the week ahead.
